edu.jhu.ben.cs335.hw2.board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.jhu.ben.cs335.hw2.board.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a gameboard for the game of Konane

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(int size)
      Creates a new game board.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void executeMove(Move move)
      try to execute the move; throws an exception if an invalid move is tried
      Chip gameWon()
      test whether the game is over, and return the color of the winning player (will return NONE if the game is not over)
      java.util.ArrayList<Move> getLegalMoves()
      returns a list of all the legal moves for the current player given the current state of the board
      int getSize()
      getter method for the board size
      Tile getTile(int row, int col)
      getter method for an indexed tile
      Tile getTile(Point p)
      wrapper for getTile using a Point as input
      int getTurn()
      getter for turn counter
      boolean legalMove(Move move)
      test if a move is legal, return true or false (doesn't throw exceptions)
      void testMove(Move move)
      test move to see if it's legal; throws an exception if it's invalid
      java.lang.String toString()
      return a string representing the board; each tile is 'b', 'w', or '.' depending on occupancy

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
